price: Džine i ljude sam stvorio samo zato da Meni u ibadetu budu.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُونِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqtu al-jina wal-insa illā liyaʿbudūni
